subScenes.name: 进店问候
subScenes.description: 店员迎接顾客并询问需求

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! How can I help you today?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您好！今天有什么可以帮您的？

responses.text: I need a new pair of glasses, my prescription's expired.
responses.text_cn: 我需要配副新眼镜，我的验光单过期了。

responses.text: Yeah, I'm due for an eye check and new frames.
responses.text_cn: 我该换眼镜了，顺便做个检查。

responses.text: Glasses, please.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用口语缩写表达需求更自然

qaPairs.speakerText: Got it! Do you have your current prescription with you?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好的！您带了旧验光单吗？

responses.text: Yeah, I've got it right here.
Actually, I don't — can you help me book a test?
responses.text_cn: 我没带，能帮我预约检查吗？

responses.text: Not yet, I'll get it later.

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据实际情况选择是否预约检查

subScenes.name: 挑选镜框
subScenes.description: 店员推荐镜框材质与款式

qaPairs.speakerText: We've got lightweight titanium frames — super comfy for all-day wear.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我们有轻巧的钛合金镜框，整天戴都很舒服。

responses.text: I'd prefer something more stylish — any metal options with color?
responses.text_cn: 我想要更时尚的，有带颜色的金属款吗？

responses.text: Hmm, maybe plastic? I like bold shapes.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，塑料的呢？我喜欢夸张造型。

responses.text: Titanium's fine.

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确表达偏好：材质/颜色/风格

qaPairs.speakerText: These acetate frames are popular — they're durable and come in 8 colors.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 这些醋酸纤维镜框很火，耐用，有8种颜色。

responses.text: Can I try on the navy blue one?
Nah, I'm good with black.
What's the price on these?

qaPairs.usageNote: 试戴前先确认颜色和价格

subScenes.name: 镜片功能咨询
subScenes.description: 询问镜片是否含防蓝光、抗反射等功能

qaPairs.speakerText: You're on the computer a lot, right? You should add blue light protection.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 你经常用电脑吧？建议加防蓝光镀膜。

responses.text: Yes, please! Does it cost extra?
Nah, I don't need it — I'm cheap.
Is it worth it for phone use?

qaPairs.usageNote: 根据使用场景决定是否加功能

qaPairs.speakerText: The anti-glare coating also helps with night driving.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 抗反射镀膜还能改善夜间开车视线。

responses.text: I drive at night — add it!
Hmm, maybe just the blue light one.
How much extra?

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确功能叠加时的额外费用

qaPairs.speakerText: So your total's $249 with the blue light and anti-glare coatings.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 加上防蓝光和抗反射，总共249美元。

responses.text: Sounds good — I'll take it!
Whoa, that's more than I expected...
Can I pay later?

qaPairs.usageNote: 价格高时可礼貌询问分期或优惠

qaPairs.speakerText: They'll be ready in 5 to 7 business days — can you pick them up next Thursday?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 5到7个工作日后做好，下周四来取可以吗？

responses.text: Thursday's perfect — I'll be here!
Can I get them sooner? I'm traveling Friday.
responses.text_cn: 能快点吗？我周五要出差。

responses.text: I'll call when I'm coming.

qaPairs.usageNote: 取货时间需确认并主动承诺

subScenes.name: 告别离店
subScenes.description: 店员送别，顾客道谢离开

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much! We'll call you when they're ready.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 谢谢！镜做好了我们打电话通知您。

responses.text: Appreciate it! See you Thursday!
Cool, thanks!
Have a good day.

qaPairs.usageNote: 告别语要带具体时间更显真诚

qaPairs.speakerText: Don't forget to bring your ID when you pick them up!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 取镜时别忘了带身份证！

responses.text: Got it, thanks again!
I'll write it down.
Okay.

qaPairs.usageNote: 重要提醒后用简短回应确认
